pages.title: Gaining Vault XP
pages.text: Above your hunger you will see your $(#033dfc)Vault Level$(), which significantly impacts several aspects inside as well as outside $(#033dfc)the Vaults$(). Each Level up until Level 200 will grant $(#033dfc)Skill Points$(), which can be used to unlock skills.

pages.title: Impacts
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Levels$() impact many things, such as the $(#033dfc)Vault Difficulty$(), $(#033dfc)Loot Tables$(), $(#033dfc)Gear Roll chances$(), $(#033dfc)Vault size$(), $(#033dfc)Objective$() & $(#033dfc)Altar Difficulty$() as well as other varying aspects of Vault Hunters.$(br2)Beyond $(#033dfc)Level 500$(), no game mechanics will scale besides the difficulty of $(#033dfc)God Altars$() & $(#033dfc)Objective difficulty$().
